title.rendered: Dental Camp Conducted at Swami Ram Tirtha Smart School, Mohali

content.rendered:
A successful dental camp was conducted at Swami Ram Tirtha Smart School, Mohali, where 139 students underwent comprehensive health check-ups, enabling early detection of common health issues.

In addition, a dental awareness session was delivered to over 300 students, highlighting key oral hygiene practices and preventive measures against infectious diseases. The initiative aimed to foster healthy habits and promote overall well-being among the students.
